mapper.select: select r.reservationIdx, s.storeName, r.reservationTime, r.useTime, r.selectedHall, r.personCount, r.alreadyUsed FROM Reservations r join Stores s on r.storeIdx=s.storeIdx WHERE r.userIdx=#{userIdx} Order By alreadyUsed, reservationTime DESC LIMIT #{pageInfo.firstIndex}, #{recordsPerPage}

select r.reservationIdx, s.storeName, r.reservationTIme, r.paymentTime, r.useTime, r.selectedHall, r.personCount, r.alreadyUsed, r.reservePrice, r.discountPrice, r.payPrice FROM Reservations r join Stores s on r.storeIdx=s.storeIdx WHERE r.reservationIdx=#{reservationIdx}
